dboxSyncer
Runtime environment: Windows XP or later / .NET Framework 4.0 or later
Description: users don't need to change their work habits, and two-way file synchronization will automatically upload, download and update versions according to their permissions, providing a convenient and efficient solution for sharing and cooperation.
Download dboxSyncer
Synchronization rules
  • If a new file is added locally, and does not exist in the network disk, the new file will be uploaded to the network disk automatically;
  • If the file is updated locally, and the version of the file does not exist in the network disk, the version will be uploaded to the network disk automatically (save as a new version);
  • If a new file is added to the network disk, and the file does not exist locally, it will be automatically downloaded locally;
  • If the network disk updates the file, and the local file version is older, it will be automatically downloaded to the local (covering the local file);
Tips: the synchronization rules will be processed according to the corresponding permissions of users and files;
Install / Uninstall
  • Install: enter the dboxSyncer folder, and run install.bat as an administrator;
  • Uninstall: enter the dboxSyncer folder, and run uninstall.bat as an administrator;
Tips: the default boot automatically run synchronization tool, and can set automatic login;
